sourcesContent:
/**
 * params:生成器函数接收的实参值，它是生成器函数执行时传递的值
 * fn(10,20,30)
 * params:[10,20,30]
 * 
 */
const fn=function* fn(){
  console.log('A')
  yield 100
  console.log('B')
  yield 200
  console.log('C')
  yield 300
  console.log('D')
  return 400
}

let itor=fn(10,20,30)



console.log(itor.next('first:111'))
console.log(itor.next('first:111'))
console.log(itor.throw())
console.log(itor.next())
